name: Paracetamol
description: Relieves mild to moderate pain and reduces fever.
dosage: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours.

name: Lisinopril
description: Treats high blood pressure and heart failure.
dosage: Take one tablet daily.

name: Omeprazole
description: Reduces stomach acid production, used for acid reflux.
dosage: Take 1 capsule before meals.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Lowers cholesterol levels, reducing the risk of heart disease.
dosage: Take one tablet at bedtime.

name: Salbutamol
description: Relieves asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) symptoms.
dosage: Inhale 2 puffs every 4-6 hours as needed.

name: Metformin
description: Controls blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.
dosage: Take with meals as prescribed.

dosage: Take as directed by your healthcare provider.

name: Ibuprofen
dosage: Take 1-2 tablets every 6-8 hours with food.

name: Montelukast
description: Used for asthma and allergic rhinitis.
